article_title: BCBSNC ups its ACA premium request, drops broad-network plans
article_text: Success! An email has been sent with a link to confirm list signup.

article_metadata.author: Alex DixonHerald-Sun

og.description: Citing higher than anticipated medical costs, Blue Cross Blue Shield of North Carolina has revised its premium filing to a 34.6 percent increase for Affordable Care Act members in 2016.
